reviewText: All the other Step 360 videos include Jessie pavelka who is a horrible teacher, but although his name is on this DVD, he isn't, which gives it five stars.  All the others  would have gotten five stars if he wasn't on them.  Basic public speaking issue of  continually saying "okay" "alright" "right" etc.  irritating.  Also the gratuitous touching he does to the girls who actually do the workout, is annoying.  Maybe more because he is so annoying.
